Package io.permazen.vaadin

Class SizedLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.server.AbstractClientConnector
      • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
        • com.vaadin.ui.Label
          • io.permazen.vaadin.SizedLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Property<String>, Property.ValueChangeListener, Property.ValueChangeNotifier, Property.Viewer, ContextClickEvent.ContextClickNotifier, MethodEventSource, ClientConnector, Sizeable, Connector, Component, Serializable, Comparable<Label>
    public class SizedLabel
extends Label
    A Label initialized to have undefined size, so its size shrinks to the content.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
